oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: War; Bridges; War damage; Military retreats; World War, 1914-1918
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bridge blown out by the Germans during retreat from Vaux-Andigny, Aisne, October 17, 1918. Bois St. Pierre, in the district of Souplet and Vaux-Andigny, Aisne, France, October 17, 1918
